entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain inland early this morning. Amount 2 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High 9. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
